title: Prompt File Frontmatter Schema
description: Frontmatter schema for .prompt.md files per VS Code Copilot specification

description.description: A short description of the prompt

name.description: The name of the prompt, used after typing / in chat. Defaults to filename if not specified.

argument-hint.description: Optional hint text shown in the chat input to guide users on expected arguments

agent.description: The agent used for running the prompt. Options: ask, edit, agent (default), or a custom agent name

model.description: The language model to use when running the prompt. Defaults to current selection if not specified.

tools.description: List of tool names or tool set names available for this prompt. Can include built-in tools, MCP tools (<server>/*), or extension tools.
